text: Brent Yonts (March 21, 1949 â€“ August 20, 2021) was an American politician. He was a Democratic member of the Kentucky House of Representatives from 1997 until losing his re-election in 2016. Yonts was born in Greenville, Kentucky. Yonts died from COVID-19 at a hospital in Owensboro, Kentucky, on August 20, 2021, at age 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Kentucky Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States
title: Brent Yonts
